problem_summary_simple: Find the constant integer added to each element of nums1 to make it equal to nums2.
problem_summary_technical: The difference between the maximum elements of nums2 and nums1 will reveal the added integer.
key_insights: Since the same integer 'x' is added to every element of nums1, the difference between corresponding elements will always be 'x'.
Therefore, the difference between the maximum element of nums2 and the maximum element of nums1 will also be 'x'.
This approach is efficient as it only requires finding the maximum element in each array.
